components.tagline: It's time to meet my maker
components.summary:
This website was created because I'm more than just a one page resume. I'm also a website with a lot of links, images and text.

The real reason is because my second co-op job was at Peekapak as a Frontend developer. The four months there made me reflect on some parts of myself and how I can use my time there to my greatest advantage.

This site appeals to my personal beliefs and short-comings.
  • I wanted to walk away with a tangible representation of the knowledge and skills I gained from this experience.
  • I often forget syntax and how to connect various parts of code together. This is a template of re-usable code for personal use.
  • I learn best by applying what I learned in a practical way. By creating a website on my own, from start to end, I can understand the process of implementing JavaScript, SCSS and Bootstrap.
Created to impress you.

slideshow.description: Screenshot of JSON file containing all the information for this page.

slideshow.title: ProjectPages.js Screenshot
slideshow.description: Information from website.json is imported and based on componentName, will render appropriate components to display information.

slideshow.title: PageComponents.js Screenshot
slideshow.description: Website.js uses these components to display and format the information from website.json

right: Automated Project Addition:

• Draws project names from array in Constants.js and automatically generates URLs
  • Sorts projects by latest update date and displays them in that order.
  • Allows slideshow navigation through projects
Completely redesigned desktop and mobile header

• Project Slideshow: (go left and right through all projects)
  • Overall better navigation
Enabled dark mode
Added Fontawesome icons
Complete overhaul of website complete
Website is in a presentable and stable state. More features will be added in the future (see Future Features)
Added features:

• React App: website is no longer pure hard-coded HTML and has multiple pages
  • Mobile view: website has a decent (or at least passable) layout on mobile devices; check out homepage Interests
  • Page Templating: project pages are all generated based on one template
  • JSON Storage: project pages are procedurally generated from JSON files
  • Slideshow: images on individual project pages can be viewed with a slideshow modal
  • Opacity: homepage projects, hompage interests and project page images will all change opacity when hovered
  • SCSS: converted all CSS to SCSS for maintainability
  • Information: updated images, 'About Me', resume, 'Projects', and 'Interests'
  • Removed any old and non-functional features from old version
Complete overhaul of website begins.
Due to newly gained experience and a better overall idea, website will be revamped to include new features, updated information and better software maintainability
Site was created for co-op applications.
Copied Parallex Template from W3Schools.
Due to lack of experience in HTML, CSS and JavaScript, site was left in a half-finished, unpresentable state.
User Interface
React.js
SCSS
Art assets for the FowlPlay.
Web design consultations.
Every team member for the projects that have made it onto this site.
Validation of designs and text edits.

Site is based off of Parallex Template.

components.title: Future Features
list:
JSON Editor
  • use draft-js
  • can create new JSON file
  • can load current JSON file
  • can edit current JSON file
  • can save edited JSON file
  • can use calendar import to fill in dates
